title: Black screen in champ select for whole party, not just me.
body:
This has happened to me and my friends multiple times.
Basically after accepting a game the champ select screen just goes black after apearing for about half a second.
Before anyone suggests the usual fixes (we've tried them all) this happens to everyone in the party, not just me, and makes it impossible to pick a champion.

I've seen the treads on the NA forums about this but none have come up with a fix for it happening to the whole party, which makes me think this is server-side as we all have different set ups and it happens at random.

Still it's annoying as hell and none of us want to get a time out because of it.
